sources.title: Mark of the Spur (1932) BOB CUSTER
sources.description:
Director: J.P. McGowan
Stars: Bob Custer, Lillian Rich, George Chesebro

A young ranch foreman is wrongfully arrested for the theft of six-thousand dollars from a tough ranch owner.

metadata.Plot: The Kid takes a job on Beckett's ranch just as Beckett's long departed wife and son John return. The Kid makes enemies of Butch and Buzzard who join up with John. The three then rob Beckett and stab him with the Kid's knife. But Alice finds spur marks on her fathers body and goes looking for the matching spur.
metadata.Actors: Bob Custer, Lillian Rich, George Chesebro
